flows.descricao: Automates the complete onboarding process for new employees including account creation, email setup, team notifications, and welcome package delivery scheduling.
Generates and distributes daily sales performance reports to management team every morning at 8 AM, including metrics, charts, and team comparisons.
Sends automated payment reminders to customers 7 days before invoice due date, with escalation emails at 3 days and on due date.
Receives customer feedback from website forms, categorizes by sentiment analysis, and routes to appropriate department with priority flags.
Monitors inventory levels every 2 hours and sends alerts to procurement team when stock falls below minimum threshold for any product.
Automatically creates purchase orders when inventory reaches critical levels, using historical data to determine optimal order quantities.
Automatically assigns incoming support tickets to available agents based on expertise, workload, and priority level using round-robin algorithm.
Compiles weekly performance metrics for all teams, including productivity stats, completed tasks, and goal achievement rates. Runs every Friday at 5 PM.
Scores and qualifies incoming leads based on predefined criteria, automatically routing hot leads to sales team and nurturing cold leads.
Sends personalized follow-up emails to leads based on their engagement level and interests, running daily at 10 AM and 3 PM.
Generates comprehensive monthly budget reports with variance analysis, sends to department heads on the first day of each month.
Routes employee expense submissions through approval chain based on amount and category, with automatic escalation after 48 hours.
Updates customers via email and SMS when order status changes (processing, shipped, delivered), with tracking information.
Sends review request emails to customers 7 days after delivery, with incentive codes for completed reviews.
Monitors compliance documents and certifications, sending alerts 30, 15, and 7 days before expiration to responsible parties.
Verifies successful completion of nightly data backups and sends alerts if any backup job fails or is incomplete.
Triggers incident response workflow when security threats are detected, notifying security team and initiating containment procedures.
Sends booking confirmations, calendar invites, and reminder notifications for meeting room reservations.
Tracks contract expiration dates and sends renewal reminders to contract owners 90, 60, and 30 days before expiration.
Uses ML model to identify at-risk customers based on engagement metrics, triggering retention campaigns and sales team alerts.
Monitors social media platforms for brand mentions every 30 minutes, categorizing sentiment and alerting team to urgent issues.
Generates daily digest of marketing campaign performance metrics, A/B test results, and ROI calculations sent to marketing team.
Schedules preventive maintenance based on equipment usage hours and creates work orders for facilities team.
Routes time-off requests through approval workflow, checks team coverage, and updates calendar upon approval.
Processes vendor invoices through approval chain, validates against purchase orders, and initiates payment transactions.
Analyzes sales pipeline weekly, identifying stagnant deals and suggesting actions to sales reps to move deals forward.
Collects QA metrics from production systems, generates defect reports, and distributes to development teams daily.
Sends NPS surveys after support ticket resolution, analyzes responses, and alerts management to negative feedback.
Scrapes competitor websites for pricing data daily, alerts pricing team when competitors adjust prices significantly.
Runs data quality checks across databases, identifying duplicates, missing values, and inconsistencies with automated cleanup where possible.

aplicativos.descricao: Comprehensive employee portal for managing personal information, time-off requests, benefits enrollment, payslips, and performance reviews. Integrates with HR systems and payroll.
Mobile-first CRM application allowing sales reps to manage leads, log activities, update opportunities, and access customer information on the go.
Web application for submitting, tracking, and approving employee expenses. Features receipt scanning, policy compliance checks, and integration with accounting software.
Real-time inventory management system with barcode scanning, stock level monitoring, automated reordering, and warehouse location tracking.
Ticketing system for customer support team to manage, track, and resolve customer issues. Includes SLA tracking, knowledge base integration, and customer communication.
Mobile app for quality inspectors to perform product inspections, log defects, capture photos, and generate quality reports on the production floor.
Campaign planning and execution platform for managing multi-channel marketing campaigns, tracking budgets, and measuring performance across all marketing initiatives.
Reservation system for meeting rooms, equipment, parking spots, and other company facilities. Features calendar integration, capacity management, and automated confirmations.
Centralized document repository for legal contracts, policies, and compliance documents with version control, approval workflows, and expiration tracking.
Admin tool for managing product catalogs, pricing, inventory sync, product descriptions, images, and multi-channel distribution for e-commerce platform.

pipelines.descricao: Extracts sales transactions from CRM and ERP systems, transforms data by cleaning, deduplicating, and enriching with customer information, then loads into data warehouse for reporting and analytics.
Synchronizes customer data across multiple systems (CRM, Support, Billing) ensuring data consistency and creating a unified customer view for all departments.
Real-time pipeline that monitors inventory changes from warehouse management system, updates stock levels across all sales channels, and triggers reorder workflows when thresholds are met.

Consolidates financial data from multiple subsidiaries and departments, performs currency conversions, calculates financial ratios, and prepares data for executive dashboards and regulatory reporting.
Aggregates marketing performance data from various sources (Google Ads, Facebook, LinkedIn, email campaigns), normalizes metrics, and provides unified marketing attribution analysis.
Extracts employee data, performance metrics, attendance records, and compensation information from HR systems, transforming into dimensional model for workforce analytics and strategic planning.

dashboards.descricao: Real-time executive dashboard displaying key performance indicators across all business units including revenue, costs, customer acquisition, employee metrics, and strategic initiative progress.
Comprehensive sales analytics showing pipeline health, win rates, sales cycle length, rep performance, territory analysis, and revenue forecasting with drill-down capabilities.
Financial performance dashboard with P&L statements, cash flow analysis, budget vs actuals, expense tracking, and financial KPIs with month-over-month and year-over-year comparisons.
Support team performance dashboard tracking ticket volume, resolution time, SLA compliance, customer satisfaction scores, and agent productivity metrics.
Inventory management dashboard showing stock levels by location, reorder points, aging inventory, turnover rates, and stockout risks across all warehouses.
Marketing effectiveness dashboard analyzing campaign performance, customer acquisition costs, conversion rates, channel attribution, and return on marketing investment.
Human capital analytics including headcount trends, turnover analysis, diversity metrics, compensation benchmarking, performance distribution, and recruitment funnel analysis.
E-commerce analytics tracking visitor behavior, conversion funnel, cart abandonment, product performance, customer segments, and revenue by channel.
Quality metrics dashboard displaying defect rates, inspection results, root cause analysis, corrective action tracking, and quality trends over time.
IT operations dashboard monitoring system uptime, incident management, service desk performance, infrastructure health, and security events.
Regulatory compliance dashboard tracking certification status, audit findings, policy adherence, training completion, and risk assessment scores.
Facilities operations dashboard showing space utilization, maintenance schedules, energy consumption, work order status, and vendor performance metrics.
